## GET [/brapi/v1/studies/{studyDbId}/layout]

```{r}
library(brapi)

# make sure brapiTS::mock_server() is running in a separate process
con <- ba_connect()

json <- ba_studies_layout(con, rclass = "json")

```

### Response

Code: 200 (application/json)

```json
`r json`
```
